title: Niagara County Clerk's Office employees (2022 - 2024)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

SENT VIA EMAIL TO peter.lopes@niagaracounty.com on 6/25/2024

***Please provide the records for each year as they become available***

1.) Yearly salary, name, and title of any and all Niagara County Clerk's Office employees for the following timeframe: 01/01/2022 through 12/31/2022

2.)  Yearly salary, name, and title of any and all Niagara County Clerk's Office employees for the following timeframe: 01/01/2023 through 12/31/2023

3.) Yearly salary, name, and title of any and all Niagara County Clerk's Office employees for the following timeframe: 01/01/2023 through 6/25/2024

https://www.niagaracounty.com/departments/a-f/county_clerk/index.php

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

The Riford Family
